title: IBM Cloud Logs Routing
introduction: You can use IBM Cloud Logs Routing to collect and route IBM Cloud logs from your account to a configured target. You can also route logs from applications on your IBM Cloud Kubernetes Service or Red Hat OpenShift on IBM Cloud clusters.

section_recommended.title: Understanding IBM Cloud Logs Routing
section_recommended.description: Learn about how to route logs by using IBM Cloud Logs Routing

section_recommended.title: Getting started with IBM Cloud Logs Routing
section_recommended.description: Use IBM Cloud Logs Routing to configure your account to route logs.

section_recommended.title: See what's new
section_recommended.description: Read about the changes to IBM Cloud Logs Routing.
